name: Rope & Bombs
description:
We're a small team working with game development on our spare time. We prefer genuine retro for real hardware. Want to contact us? Feel free to send us an e-mail!

The games we make are neither licensed by nor affiliated with Nintendo. Game Boy is a trademark of Nintendo.

Interested in Game Boy game development?

We have actually written a book on the topic, called Game Boy Assembly Programming for the Modern Game Developer which you can find and download here!
